attributes.action: Not recommend Bruce Forsyth for a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bruce Forsyth has enjoyed a well paid career over the past 50 years or so and he still insists on strutting about on television using his well worn and inane catch phrases. He should thank everybody who has allowed him to enjoy a very comfortable lifestyle and retire gracefully and quietly. Too many so called "stars" are "recognised" just for doing a very well paid and easy job of work.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office Ceremonial Secretariat now deals with all matters concerning honours. Please see www.honours.gov.uk for more information.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
